title: Virginia Madsen on Her Personal Connection to Armed Forces PTSD Drama ‘Sheepdog’ and How it Helped Her Process Grief
summary: The term Gold Star Family refers to the immediate family of a U.S. service member who died in the line of duty. It’s a term Oscar-nominated actor Virginia Madsen was all too familiar with even before she signed on to the film “Sheepdog,” which hits theaters today. Written, directed, produced and st…

title: Many high-capacity NVMe SSDs are now as expensive as gold by weight as shortage intensifies — we ran the numbers, here's what we found
summary: High-capacity NVMe SSDs are quickly becoming pricier than their gold weight
